alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 22 at 1:30PM MST until November 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches for lower elevations with 12 to 18 inches in the northern Laramie Range above 5500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Converse and Niobrara counties and the Northern Laramie Range in northeastern Albany and western Platte counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday to 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County; North Laramie Range
